job_tasks.phrase: developing and testing the RWS software
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in the development and testing lifecycle of software.

job_tasks.phrase: design and write test automation code
job_tasks.justification: Writing test automation code is a core software development activity for QA.
Manual testing, while not strictly development, is a crucial part of the software quality assurance process.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software
job_tasks.justification: This implies collaboration with the team to achieve product quality and innovation, which requires understanding business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: define and drive technical initiatives to keep the platform current and more efficient
job_tasks.justification: Driving technical initiatives to improve platform currency and efficiency demonstrates an understanding of business needs and strategic direction.

job_tasks.phrase: Create test plans based on Risk-based testing technique
job_tasks.justification: Creating test plans is a design and planning activity within software development for quality assurance.

job_tasks.phrase: Define the required QA coverage for the stories in the team Grooming and Planning meetings
job_tasks.justification: Defining QA coverage for stories requires understanding project requirements and business priorities.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute automated and manual tests in accordance with the test plan
job_tasks.justification: Executing tests, both automated and manual, is a direct software development activity for validation.
Configuring testing environments is a practical software development and operations task.

job_tasks.phrase: Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with developers, reproducing issues, and managing defects are integral parts of the software development and QA process.

job_tasks.phrase: Define the scope of regression testing for every release using a Risk-based approach
job_tasks.justification: Defining regression testing scope involves planning and strategic execution within the software development cycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and create automated test cases in the Java automation suite
job_tasks.justification: Designing and creating automated test cases directly falls under software development for testing purposes.

job_tasks.phrase: Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation
job_tasks.justification: Proactively identifying automation opportunities is a development-focused activity for improving efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and monitor nightly runs of automated tests
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring and designing automated test runs are operational tasks within the software development lifecycle, akin to MLOps for testing.
Designing and executing performance tests is a specialized aspect of software development focused on quality and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing test results and reporting them is part of the software development quality assurance process.

soft_skills.phrase: ready to learn and grow, and interested in facing and overcoming technical challenges
work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software
steer the defect through its lifecycle

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional QA engineering tasks, including manual and automated testing, software development for test suites, and performance testing. There is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related AI-specific concepts, which are the core requirements for a GenAI Engineer profile.
